https://tmrev.io/movie/422799-Aberfan: The Green Hollow 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null A film poem to commemorate the 50th anniversary of the Aberfan disaster, written by Owen Sheers and performed by a stellar cast of Wales's best-known acting talent, including Michael Sheen, Jonathan Pryce, Sian Phillips, Eve Myles and Iwan Rheon, with some contributions from the local community. Aberfan: The Green Hollow
